description:
How to Win at 1v1 League of Legends

Want to sharpen your League of Legends 1v1 skills and improve your awareness, mechanics, and decision making? Playing games on tr2 1v1.lol can help you achieve that. Here are some tips to help you win more 1v1 games on the platform.

Champion Pool - Focus on 2-3 champions you are most comfortable on. Repetitively playing the same champions helps you master their mechanics and ability usage. - Pick champions that can carry 1v1s. Assassins, fighters, and battle mages tend to perform best in 1v1 matches. - Avoid overly team-reliant champions that struggle without jungle pressure and laners to assist.

Matchups

- Learn the strengths and weaknesses of your champions against specific enemy picks. Certain champions counter others in 1v1 scenarios. - Play around your champions spikes and all in timings. Some champions prefer short extended trades while others want to full combo all in. - Respect your enemy laner's power spikes. Don't greedily overextend if your laner just hit level 6 or has a completed item you don't have.

Vision Control

- Place deep wards in the enemy jungle to track their movements. This prevents you from getting ganked and gives you info on when the enemy will return to lane. - Pink ward crucial brushes and pixel bush to give you more lane dominance and limit the enemy's options.

CSing and Trading

- Focus on last hitting minions perfectly. Every minion you miss gives your laner an advantage. - Only trade when you have minion advantage or your enemy mispositions. Look for opportunities, not every trade needs to be taken. - Always look at the enemy's ability cooldowns before engaging in a trade.
name: tr2 games 1v1.lol
